chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
q: nat
l: nat
Hl: 0 < l
Hlq: l + 1 < q
Hq: 1 <= q
Hq': 0 < 4 * q
r: nat
Hr': 4 <= r
Hr: 2 <= r

Goal:
2 * l < r

Premises:
bezout_rel_prime_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> is_gcd p q 1 -> {a : nat & {b : nat | a * p + b * q = 1 + p * q /\ a <= q /\ b <= p}}
bezout_generalized_lt : forall p q : nat, 0 < p < q -> {a : nat & {b : nat & {g : nat & {l : nat & {u : nat & {v : nat | a * p + b * q = g + l /\ is_gcd p q g /\ is_lcm p q l /\ p = u * g /\ q = v * g /\ a <= v /\ b <= u}}}}}}
Nat.log2_iter_spec : forall k p q r : nat, 2 ^ S p = q + S r -> r < 2 ^ p -> let s := Nat.log2_iter k p q r in 2 ^ s <= k + q < 2 ^ S s
natr_ring_lemma1 : forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (lpe : list (Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N * Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N)) (pe1 pe2 : Ring_polynom.PExpr BinNums.N), Ring_polynom.interp_PElist 0 1 Init.Nat.add Init.Nat.mul (SRsub Init.Nat.add) (SRopp (R:=nat)) eq BinNat.N.to_nat id_phi_N (pow_N 1 Init.Nat.mul) l lpe -> (let lmp := Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list BinNums.N0 (BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH) BinNat.N.add BinNat.N.mul BinNat.N.add (fun x : BinNums.N => x) BinNat.N.eqb BinNat.N.div_eucl lpe in Ring_polynom.Peq BinNat.N.eqb (Ring_polynom.norm_subst BinNums.N0 (BinNums.Npos BinNums.xH) BinNat.N.add...
Hseq_u : forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> forall a : nat, a <= m -> ∑ a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r) = msum nat_join 0 a (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)
equation_inj : forall x y a b : nat, 1 <= x -> 1 + x * a = y -> 1 + x * b = y -> a = b
sum_power_binary_lt : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r)
const_u1_prefix : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> {q : nat | q <= m /\ u * u ⇣ w = ∑ q (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)}
nat_meet_powers_neq : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall i j a b : nat, i <> j -> a < r -> b < r -> a * power i r ⇣ (b * power j r) = 0
prime_algo : forall p : nat, prime p < -> p = 2 \/ 3 <= p /\ ~ divides 2 p /\ (forall n : nat, 3 + 2 * n < p -> ~ divides (3 + 2 * n) p)
is_lcm_moduplus : forall k p q g l u : nat, p = u * g -> is_gcd p q g -> is_lcm p q l -> is_lcm p (q + k * p) (l + k * u * p)
Hg2 : forall (m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) (Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) (i : nat), 2 * proj1_sig (g_full f Hf1 Hf2) i <= 2 * m
nat_meet_12 = nat_meet_12n 1 : 1 ⇣ 2 = 0
mult_lt_power_2_4' : forall u1 v1 u2 v2 k : nat, u1 < power k 2 -> v1 < power k 2 -> u2 < power k 2 -> v2 < power k 2 -> u1 * v1 + v2 * u2 < power (4 * k) 2
power_2_minus_1_gt : forall n x : nat, x < power n 2 < -> x ≲ power n 2 - 1
sum_power_binary_lt_inv : forall q : nat, 0 < q -> forall r : nat, r = power q 2 -> forall (p n : nat) (f e : nat -> nat) (m : nat), 0 < p <= q -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> e i < e j) -> m ≲ (power p 2 - 1) * ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> exists a : nat -> nat, m = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) r) /\ (forall i : nat, i < n -> a i < power p 2)
power_decomp.power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
power_decomp_factor : forall p : nat, 2 <= p -> forall (n : nat) (f a : nat -> nat), (forall i : nat, 0 < i < S n -> f 0 < f i) -> ∑ (S n) (fun i : nat => a i * power (f i) p) = ∑ n (fun i : nat => a (S i) * power (f (S i) - f 0 - 1) p) * power (S (f 0)) p + a 0 * power (f 0) p
Hu2_w : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r)) ⇣ w = 0
sum_powers_inc_lt : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (p r : nat), 2 <= r -> (forall i : nat, i < n -> f i < p) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < n -> f i < f j) -> ∑ n (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) < power p r
power_ge_1 : forall k p : nat, p <> 0 -> 1 <= power k p
Hu1 : forall (m k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r) = msum nat_join 0 m (fun i : nat => 1 * power (2 * f i) r)
euclid_2 : forall n : nat, exists q : nat, n = 2 * q \/ n = 1 + 2 * q
const_u1_eq : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> u * u ⇣ w = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r)
const_u2_meet : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i = power (S i) 2) -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ (2 * w) < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r))
mult_lt_power_2 : forall u v k : nat, u < power k 2 -> v < power k 2 -> u * v < power (2 * k) 2
mult_lt_power_2_4 : forall u v k : nat, u < power k 2 -> v < power k 2 -> u * v < power (4 * k) 2
Hg1 : forall (m k : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (Hf1 : forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) (Hf2 : forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j), ∑ m (fun i : nat => ∑ i (fun j : nat => 2 * power (f i + f j) r)) = ∑ (2 * k) (fun i : nat => 2 * proj1_sig (g_full f Hf1 Hf2) i * power i r)
const_u1_meet : forall (m k k' u w : nat) (f : nat -> nat), 2 * m < r -> (forall i : nat, i < m -> f i <= k) -> (forall i j : nat, i < j < m -> f i < f j) -> w = ∑ k' (fun i : nat => power i r) -> u = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (f i) r) -> 2 * k < k' -> forall p : nat, p = u * u ⇣ w < -> p = ∑ m (fun i : nat => power (2 * f i) r)
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => n | S k => match m with | 0 => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.sub (_ _)%nat_scope

intros.
apply Hseq_u with (m:=l) (k':=q) (u:=u) (w:=w) (f:=fun i => 2 * i).
- apply Hlq.
- intros. apply Hl.
- reflexivity.
- reflexivity.
Qed.
